resources.string: "지금 항목을 휴지통에 일시적으로 삭제하시겠습니까?\n(항목을 영구히 삭제하려면 아래 상자를 선택하십시오.)"

string.name: move_to_trash_progress
string.description: Progress Content: text in progress dialog

string.name: move_to_trash_success_one
string.description: Toast: move to recycle bin success. %s is variable string.

string.name: move_to_trash_success_more
string.description: Toast: move to recycle bin success

string.name: move_to_trash_fail
string.description: Toast: move to recycle bin fails

string.name: restore_success_one
string.description: Toast: restore success. %s is variable string.

string.name: restore_progress
string.description: Progress Content: text in progress dialog

string.name: calculate_progress
string.description: Progress Content: text in progress dialog

resources.string: "항목이 너무 커서 휴지통에 버릴 수 없습니다.\n영구히 삭제하시겠습니까?"
